title: Problems with getting into the client?
body: Today I launched the game and it told me there was an update, though nothing popped up about a possible patch or even files being touched. Cannot get past the login screen where you input your username and password. It tells me "Unable to connect to the authentication service."; if it helps --- I am from Europe west but play on North American server because of friends. Thanks!

replies.body: It sounds like your connection is getting blocked from getting to a few of our services, including the patching and authentication servers.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should be able to help clear up those snags.

I am not sure if rebooting helped or the issue somehow fixed itself but I am not able to login! Thank you for your help, though :) I will keep this in mind in case it happens again. Have a swell weekend!
